If It would let me install where i want with the drag thing I would
Can someone just tell me the steps to partion and install ubuntu manual
The installer has an option to do manual partitioning.
You don't have to do it before you run the installer.
I don't think we'd release something that we knew would eat Windows partitions... there is an option right in the installer to resize it.
Why do you want to use advanced mode? If you just want to resize the Windows partition, the Ubuntu installer will ask you if you want to resize it.
System->Administration->Partition Editor.
Yes, it's installed by default. In System->Administration.
Yes. Now you can tell it to resize your Windows partition.
There is no little unlock icon along the bottom?
yes there is but it's not active
the only active buttons are help and close
